meanings.definition: To release gas from a substance
meanings.sent1: When you heat up the rock, it outgases and releases bubbles of gas.
meanings.sent2: The volcano outgases harmful gases into the atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The cheese outgases so much that it could power a balloon!
meanings.sent4: The old refrigerator seemed to outgases memories of past meals.
meanings.sent5: The flower outgases a sweet fragrance that fills the room.

meanings.definition: The act of emitting gas from a material
meanings.sent1: The outgases from the factory were causing pollution in the town.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the outgases released by different types of rocks.
meanings.sent3: The outgases from the compost bin made the gardener hold their nose.
meanings.sent4: The outgases of the chemical reaction created a colorful display in the lab.
meanings.sent5: The outgases of the swamp created a unique smell in the air.
